limitation_of_liability.description: Except as expressly stated in the Agreement, Elsevier disclaims liability to the customer in connection with performance of the Agreement; in no event is Elsevier liable for special, indirect, or consequential damages, including loss of profits, loss of business, or unfitness for user purposes.
